name: Boris' Theory of Everything

core_principles.description: Love transcends all other laws, reflected in the vibrations of creation.
Time facilitates learning about love through experiences.
Consciousness is the primary substance from which all else emerges.
Everything in the universe is interconnected, forming one holistic system.

core_principles.principle: Ethics as a Path to Divinity
core_principles.description: Moral actions align individuals with the divine essence of love.
Scientific inquiry should ultimately aim to enhance our capacity for love.

core_principles.principle: Technology as an Extension of Love
core_principles.description: Technology should be developed to foster love and unity among beings.

implications: This theory suggests a holistic view of existence where love guides all aspects of human life, ethics, science, and technology towards a divine end.

seo.title: Boris' Theory of Everything - A Comprehensive New Theory
seo.description: Explore Boris' Theory of Everything, where love is the ultimate law governing all aspects of existence.
keywords.author: Boris

meta_tags.og:title: Boris' Theory of Everything - A Comprehensive New Theory
meta_tags.og:description: Discover how love unifies science, philosophy, and ethics in Boris' Theory of Everything.
